name: Army Combat City War
description:
Army Combat City War is a real 3D army combat war and shooter FPS game with elite commando sniper training skills and adventure, all in one in this amazing sniper shooter military war game with dangerous and advance guns and weapons.
Features
1. Destroy enemy basis and defend yours
2. 3D War Environment
3. Sound Effects with High Quality
4. Counter Alien Terrorists to destroy
5. Pick your favorite modern combat weapon
